remarks: If an integer ` N ` is smaller or equal to a real, and we subtract a quantity smaller than ` 1 ` , then ` N ` is smaller or equal to the result.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
zltlesub.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. ZZ ) $.
zltlesub.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
zltlesub.nlea $e |- ( ph -> N <_ A ) $.
zltlesub.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
zltlesub.blt1 $e |- ( ph -> B < 1 ) $.
zltlesub.asb $e |- ( ph -> ( A - B ) e. ZZ ) $.
zltlesub $p |- ( ph -> N <_ ( A - B ) ) $.
